name: Touch and Jump Platform Game
description:
Play touch and jump in different jump mode and in different themes.
How to play
It allows you to choose two different characters at the start of the game.
Jump to different boards without missing any as fast as you can because of the pace of each board you jump to.
Missing a board requires starting from scratch.
Earn coins as you progress to other levels and mode.
Use coins to buy new life, power-ups, slow down the pace of the board and score combo multiplier.
Play touch and jump in a swift HD graphics and have a pleasurable experience
